China: Johann Adam Schall von Bell wrote the first Chinese language treatise on the telescope.
The Jesuit Nicolas Trigault invented the first system for the romanization of Chinese.
Battle of Ningyuan: A Ming force defended Xingcheng against a numerically superior later Jin army. Nurhaci suffered fatal wounds.
Philippine: Juan Niño de Tabora appointed Governor-General (1626–1632).
Taiwan: The Dutch force the Chinese inhabitants of Taiwan to obtain a permit of residence
Spanish expedition to Formosa: The Spanish arrive at Santissima Trinidad (Jilong) and build a fort
